Name: Space Architect
About the game: Humanity reached stars using megacorporation funds to fuel exploration & expansion. You're one of the station architects who's trying to pay off debt taken from one of such corporations. Good management of resources is your golden ticket to freedom & richness. It's deep space after all. Units The building block of your base, they work, eat, die. They are expensive to get and got easily overworked, so automatize your station as soon as you can! Trade As soon as you'll have your docking port set up - you will start to get visitors to trade with - earn cash, supply yourself with rare items and gain tech points. Production Change one resource into another, more complex one, with the help of devices at your station. Base resources are obtained by mining asteroids. Quests Mainly to get you to know game mechanics. Tech You know nothing but basics. Gain tech points through trading and unlock advanced technologies to produce rare items and do it faster.
